eval_kwargs.reference_answer: This formula is to compute dynamic parameters and transform the less important dynamic parameters into input-agnostic static parameters. Specifically, a mask M_i is utilized to indicate whether the i-th element of ˆΘ is dynamic or static. Mi = 1 means the i-th element of ˆΘ is dynamic so we update it through the dynamic function W with input x and dynamic factors Θ. Otherwise, ˆΘ remains the same.
